mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMO (LECTURE, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{lecture} , #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT c.CODE, c.LECTURE, c.PROFESSOR, c.START_TIME, c.END_TIME, c.DAYOFWEEK , m.LECTURE, m.TITLE, m.CONTENT FROM COURSE c LEFT JOIN MEMO m ON c.LECTURE = m.LECTURE WHERE c.LECTURE = #{value}
